events.message: The applicant submitted their resume and cover letter for the software engineer position early this morning, indicating a strong interest in backend development.
After reviewing the application, the file was tagged under the Engineering cluster due to keywords like software engineer and developer found in the submission.
The assigned recruiter reached out internally to confirm their availability and began preparing to contact the candidate for initial screening.
An initial phone screening was conducted to assess the candidate's experience in software development and discuss their familiarity with our tech stack, which was promising.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed enthusiasm for moving forward with technical interviews, highlighting their recent projects in cloud infrastructure.
A technical interview was scheduled for the candidate on June 6th to further evaluate their coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and system design knowledge.
